tool.name: SAGA.shapes_grid.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT True isArrayPOLYGONS False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.shapes_grid.7 INPUT $INPUT POLYGONS $POLYGONS EXTENT $EXTENT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Clips the input grid with a polygon shapefile. Select polygons from the shapefile prior to tool execution in case you like to use only a subset from the shapefile for clipping.
